definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)

sentences.english: The informative treatment subsystem is a typical real-time information processing system.
sentences.chinese: 情报处理分系统是一个典型的实时信息处理系统。

sentences.english: Mainly pay attention to design subsystem's function.
sentences.chinese: 主要指期量标准分系统功能设计。

sentences.english: It is a important component of a subsystem in the control center.
sentences.chinese: 它是一个控制中心分系统的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: Electrical power system is one of the important subsystem of a satellite.
sentences.chinese: 供配电系统是卫星的一个重要分系统。

sentences.english: The control loading system is a very important subsystem in flight simulator.
sentences.chinese: 操纵负荷系统是飞行模拟器的关键分系统之一。

sentences.english: The antenna gyro-stabilized platform of airborne synthetic aperture radar is one of most important parts.
sentences.chinese: 天线稳定平台是机载SAR系统的重要分系统之一。
